text: Marek Krajčí Marek Krajčí (born 1974) is the minister of health of Slovakia, serving since 21 March 2020. He has been a deputy in the National Council since 2016, for the Ordinary People party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the National Council (Slovakia) Category:OĽaNO politicians Category:Health ministers of Slovakia Category:1974 births
title: Marek Krajčí
